HE PLEDGED TO END OBAMACARE, COMMON CORE EDUCATION PRACTICES, AND SAY THE SECOND AMENDMENT RIGHT TO BEAR ARMS. >> WE HAVE AN OPPORTUNITY TO MA AMERICA, HONESTLY, GREATER THAN EVER BEFORE. DAVID: HE IS INSPECTED TO ADD TO HIS DELEGATE LEAD ON TUESDAY, WHERE VOTERS HERE IN MARYLAND POLLS. THE BATTLE FOR DELEGATES MAKING

article_metadata.author: David Collins

og.description: Hundreds turned out Sunday as Republican presidential front-runner Donald Trump made a campaign stop in Hagerstown. Trump's rally included mainly supporters while a group of protesters were also present nearby. The visit by Trump came just two days before Maryland's primary on Tuesday
